name: viewarr
description: A browser-based array/image viewer using Rust, WASM, and egui

scripts.postbuild:wasm: cp js/index.js pkg/wrapper.js && cp js/index.d.ts pkg/wrapper.d.ts && node -e "const p=require('./pkg/package.json'); p.main='wrapper.js'; p.types='wrapper.d.ts'; p.files.push('wrapper.js','wrapper.d.ts'); require('fs').writeFileSync('./pkg/package.json', JSON.stringify(p, null, 2));"
scripts.postbuild:wasm:dev: cp js/index.js pkg/wrapper.js && cp js/index.d.ts pkg/wrapper.d.ts && node -e "const p=require('./pkg/package.json'); p.main='wrapper.js'; p.types='wrapper.d.ts'; p.files.push('wrapper.js','wrapper.d.ts'); require('fs').writeFileSync('./pkg/package.json', JSON.stringify(p, null, 2));"
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run postbuild:wasm
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:wasm:dev && npm run postbuild:wasm:dev
